name: TAAA - DigiBaby2022 #910
description:
《數位亞洲大會（DigiAsia）》於2014年誕生。這個由亞洲16個地區組成《Asian Federation of Advertising Associations（簡稱AFAA）亞洲廣告聯盟》授權台北市廣告代理商業同業公會（TAAA）所主辦的活動，每兩年於台北召開，是亞洲地區最具指標性的數位與創意國際盛會。

今年第五屆 DigiAsia ，大會空投紀念 NFT 給與會者 ，共計 1,080 款變化，希望以 Digibaby 的好奇心，陪伴與會者探索 WEB 3 的世界。

DigiAsia is a digital marketing congress authorized by the Asian Federation of Advertising Associations (AFAA). Taipei Association of Advertising Agencies (TAAA) organizes this outstanding event which takes place in Taiwan once every two years (every even year) starting from 2014.

This year is the 5th DigiAsia. We airdrop commemorative NFTs for attendees, with a total of 1,080 variational articles, and accompany attendees to explore the world of WEB 3 with DigiBaby’s curiosity.
